overview: In the historic battle of Thermopylae, 480 B.C., 300 courageous Spartan warriors valiantly fought a massive invading Persian army. Spartan King Leonidas and his 300 warriors fell in battle, but their heroic action inspired all of Greece to stand up against the Persian army and defeat them. A new, sex dominant Queen took the reign in Greece and rewarded the victorious Greek army with her body...
title: The 300
